Enjoy!

I'd highly recommend "Malibu's Most Wanted" for you! This hilarious comedy stars Damien Dante Wayans and Jamie Kennedy, where a senator hires two actors to pretend to be murderers to scare his son out of rapping. It's filled with laughter and unexpected twists that will keep you entertained. Enjoy the ride!

If you're interested in a more intriguing blend of science fiction and comedy, "Fanboys" might be right up your alley. This film, featuring stars like Seth Rogen and Kristen Bell, tells the story of a group of Star Wars fans on a mission to see The Phantom Menace before it spoilers its plot – perfect for fans of the saga or just lovers of a good laugh!

I think you'll find both movies enjoyable!
